title: Looking to buy deaf ballplayers cards and items
author: ubiqty

posts.post_title: Looking to buy deaf ballplayers cards and items
posts.post_content:
If anyone has any Dummy Hoy or Dummy Taylor items, I would be interested.  Please contact me privately at [url]scottg@accessmfgsys.com[/url].

I'm specifically looking for:

E R Williams Game - Hoy
any N172 - Hoy
Team photos with Hoy
W600 - Taylor
Rose postcard - Taylor
T206 Taylor with Tolstoi back

Thanks,
Scott.
